div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1132 Cherronesus (near mod. Sevastopol'), 1956 Burial: late 2nd cent. B.C. Contents: 10+ AR Cherronesus: dr. (as BMC 3) Disposition: Sevastopol' 6; Moscow 2; private coll. 2 Gilevich, NSf 1968, p. 38, note 168; â€ further information from Gilevich
